Articles.Content:
Well did i do something wrong? something? I installed it all correctly what the hell did I do wrong?

P.S take a look at the images http://imgur.com/a/B8495
Hi @MightyPeppers, I have moved your post to modded support, hopefully someone can help you

Try the RVE thread.

Firstly, RVE is still highly WIP so expect bugs. Secondly, afaik, there's no compatibility with 1.05 at all. Thirdly, did you follow all the instructions? You say you installed scatterer, rve and eve. You can't just install EVE. You need specific versions of it to work with RVE. You don't say which versions of what you have installed so without knowing more information there's little anyone can do.
This is an old eve bug, please read the rve forums page op, and install instructions, when you launch you need to open eve gui and hit apply. (alt+e)
